_sText:
easyhostage_v2.bsp  goes into your cstrike/maps folder, usually C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\Username\Counter-Strike Source\cstrike\maps

Don't reupload this file, is it even worth it? Yes it is worth it because its a legendary map and if you reupload ill bite your face off and eat all your babies.

Smell ya later,
Chris
